sentence.text: Thiolated carboxymethylcellulose: in vitro evaluation of its permeation enhancing effect on peptide drugs.
Cysteine was covalently linked to carbodiimide activated NaCMC.
Iodometric titration of the polymer conjugates was used to determine the extent of immobilised cysteine.
Cysteine conjugation at 3.6, 5.3 and 7.3% (m/m) resulted in R-values of 1.4, 1.7 and 1.8, respectively.
